channel.title: How to download Java (With pics!) - Newb Friendly
channel.description:
Hi, this is a very simple guide to show how to download Java. The [b]RED[/b] rectangles is what you should click on.
Step 1 - Go to Google and type in "Java 6.0 Download" and click "Google search".
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img178.imageshack.us/img178/3944/step1gy0.png[/img][/URL]
Step 2 - Click on the link that I've shown.
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img136.imageshack.us/img136/5742/43257514es5.png[/img][/URL]
Step 3 - Once the page is loaded click on "Java 6u11"
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img136.imageshack.us/img136/583/88335017jk8.png[/img][/URL]
Step 4 - Click on "Accept"
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img136.imageshack.us/img136/3373/59766161vn1.png[/img][/URL]
Step 5 - Choose your installer, for the people that aern't sure click choose the online one.
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img136.imageshack.us/img136/7234/84891124xu3.png[/img][/URL]
Thanks! =D
~ 99

item.description:
@99_stats_owns wrote:

Hi, this is a very simple guide to show how to download Java. The RED rectangles is what you should click on.

Step 1 - Go to Google and type in “Java 6.0 Download” and click “Google search”.

Step 2 - Click on the link that I’ve shown.

Step 3 - Once the page is loaded click on “Java 6u11”

Step 4 - Click on “Accept”

Step 5 - Choose your installer, for the people that aern’t sure click choose the online one.

Thanks! =D

~ 99
